alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 10:27PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Henry County in southeastern Alabama, Clay, Randolph, northwestern Calhoun, northwestern Early and Quitman Counties in southwestern Georgia through 1215 AM EDT/1115 PM CDT/... At 1127 PM EDT/1027 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Osco to 8 miles northwest of Blakely. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Gaines, Morgan, Georgetown, Cuthbert, Edison, Bellville, Bluffton, Shorterville, Wire Bridge, Parksville, Carnegie, Hayes, Watson Crossroads, Scottsboro Crossroads, Ricks Place, Pecan, Thomas Mill Creek, Hatcher, Morris and Bethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
